title: 299 fined for violating COVID-19 SOP in Manipur

title: COVID-19: Dose shortage hits vaccination drive in Mumbai
description: Mumbai, April 9: Several vaccination centres across Mumbai, including a jumbo COVID-19 facility in business district BKC, suspended inoculation on Friday morning due to a shortage of doses, BMC sources said.
